sub_title: Delivery Enablement Performance Manager - Core Networks
summary:
Program Manager with broad knowledge in Financial Planning, Forecasting & Analysis with focus on Risk Management in different technologies. Leader and team player, handling communications within an international and multi-cultural, geographically spread organization with interaction at all levels and different cultures of people. PMP certified and tech-savvy professional with extensive experience leading teams and end-to-end Transformation Programs and driving the Business Operations for effective governance. An enthusiast in Data Analytics & Business Intelligence, focusing on continuous improvement of daily operations, reporting and analysis with expertise in PowerBI. Accountable personality with problem solving & result-driven approach. Multilingual with English and Turkish

* PMP certified Project Manager (#1497961)
* PowerBI - Business Intelligence & Data Analytics
* APMP Certified Bid Manager – experience in Bid Management & Technical Pre-Sales.
* Green Belt Certification - Ongoing

school.name: Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University
Orta Doğu Teknik Üniversitesi / Middle East Technical University

profile_positions.title: Core Networks - Delivery Enablement Performance Manager
Head of Transformation & Service Operations MEA - Cloud & Network Services
Market Unit Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Established Governance of Transformation Program within GS MEA; reviewed & verified business cases, guided & trained teams, ensured effective communication between all parties in an international & multicultural environment for successful execution of programs.
•	Designed & Executed face-to-face Transformation Workshops for audiences of 30-50 people. Achieved Savings of yearly 30-60 m€ from 2016-2019 through Transformation in MEA. 
•	Created effective Data Analysis & Business Intelligence Reporting using PowerBI for Transformation Programs, Financial & Business Operations which were used MEA Wide increasing visibility, transparency and efficiency.
profile_positions.title: MEA Transformation Business Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for 
- Cost Control for Etisalat Projects
- PMO functions for Middle East & North Africa Project with focus on Financial KPIs.
profile_positions.title: WLS MENA PMO Professional

profile_positions.description:
Oversaw all bid management & technical pre-sales activities for seamless delivery of products and services offered by Alcatel-Lucent covering IP Networks, Fixed Networks, Mobile Networks business groups. Prepared multiple project layouts and documentation, customer presentations, meetings and workshops, RFP responses, and critique. Attended customer engagement meetings to understand and reflect client expectations during offer preparation. 
•	Lead end-to-end preparation of commercial and technical offers for complex tenders up to 100 m€ volume through coordination of technical, legal, commercial, financial, managerial teams; consolidated inputs from multiple teams and ensured timely delivery of attractive and high-quality offers.
•	Actively participated in Offer Defence & Negotiation Meetings where different levels of customer interaction and management was needed; Commercial & Technical Solution Presentation.
•	In scope of Technical Pre-Sales; designed end-to-end technical solutions for IP/MPLS, DSL, GPON, Mobile Backhauling & TDM Multiplexing projects.
profile_positions.title: Bids & Proposals Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 20 people at an ISP; Engineers handling daily operations of Network, IT and VSAT systems and field team handling on site installation, commissioning needs of customers.   
Took part in every detail of establishing a new ISP & VSAT Services: RIPE Communications & IP Management;  Handled Project & Operations Management Installation, Configuration & Administration of Routers, Switches & Firewalls; DNS, E-Mail, Web, RADIUS, LDAP Servers; Oracle Database; Ensuring proper backups of all server and routers. Communications with Telecom Operator for ISDN PRI, SDH, ATM, TDM Connections. Troubleshooting Network & IT Problems. Supporting Call Center Team for troubleshooting services.
profile_positions.title: Network & IT Group Manager

profile_positions.description: Take part in all technical aspects of establishing an ISP from Networking to IT.
profile_positions.title: Network & Systems Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description:
I have always enjoyed learning about telecommunications and have been amazed while exploring how our world is connected through IP Packets and telecommunication devices. Being part of INUA team (Nokia - UN Women Collaboration that seeks to promote STEM education for schoolgirls in Kenya) and having the opportunity to connect to girls to share my knowledge to encourage and inspire them to study STEM is so precious.

 Within the INUA team, my main role was content creation on the topics; “the journey of IP packets through telecommunication devices” and “basics of telecommunications” and I created a short video and a booklet.

The creation of this video helped me to answer the question “What does Nokia do mummy?” raised by my kids. And it is being used in Kenya when we visit the schools to encourage girls for STEM education.  

I hope you also watch it, enjoy it, and hare to encourage girls for STEM education.

https://youtu.be/nvJ4jhy_lWs
